description: Nutritionally approved and perfect as a weeknight dinner, these lamb kofta wraps feature juicy tomato, chargrilled eggplant and zingy tzatziki.
name: Lamb kofta and veggie wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch mint, leaves picked, chopped (plus extra leaves to serve)
0.25 bunch coriander, leaves picked, chopped (plus extra leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large, greased chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook eggplant, turning, for 8 minutes or until charred and tender. Transfer to a plate and set aside. Heat bread on same pan, turning, for 2 minutes or until charred. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, place chickpeas in a bowl and mash with a fork. Add lamb, onion, garlic, egg, mint and coriander. Mix well. Using wet hands, shape 1/4 cupfuls mixture into 8 ovals.
Cook kofta on chargrill pan over medium-high heat, turning, for 10 minutes or until cooked through.
Top bread with tzatziki, eggplant and kofta. Scatter over tomato and extra mint and coriander. Season with pepper. Serve drizzled with oil.
